summary: Implements a Home Assistant sensor platform that creates virtual sensors producing synthetic readings based on configurable mathematical parameters (amplitude, mean, period, phase, etc.). The module defines a configuration schema, default values, and an entity class that calculates the current value on each update, handling unit conversion, icon assignment, and optional random noise.
